# Redis

# 启动Redis

  • docker 方式
docker run -itd --name redis-test -p 6379:6379 --network my_default --network-alias redis redis:5.0.12 --requirepass "root123"
  • 进入容器
docker exec -it redis-test bash
  • 连接 redis
redis-cli

auth root123

set key1 value1

get key1

# Redis的帮助命令

https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1687027
